page.title: 14Recreation
page.content: Snooker and dominoes are played in the working mens club , with teams in their repective leagues. Although the club was originally a working mens club it is now open to ladies, and social events take place regularly with entertainment and dancs by professional groups. Social events are also held in the Jubilee hall. There is an old R.A.F hanger at Stoke heath which has been turned into a sports centre, this is about 3 miles from Childs Ercall and the Junior children are taken there by their teachers after school one day a week. During the winter 5 a side football and netball are played with 3 or 4 other schools in the summer badminton , tri skating, gymnastics etc are available . The advantage of having such a large building for sport is that the following facilities are available at
